text: Mvezo is a small village in Umtata (now Mthatha). It is by the Mbashe River in the Eastern Cape of South Africa. The village is known as being the birthplace of former South African president Nelson Mandela. Mandela was born in Mvezo on July 18, 1918.Grave dispute divides family as Mandela lies in hospital at Reuters.com ==References== Category:Nelson Mandela Category:Villages in Africa Category:Mthatha
title: Mvezo
